Articles.Content:
Greetings to you from Texas, USA home of the latest branch of Kerbal Space Program, mine ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I aquired this game after seeing it at a friend's house, and I haven't had this much fun in a long, long time. I look forward to learning this game and all the many spectacular failures I'm about to put my Kerbals through. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the forums!

Having fun by learning through spectacular failure happens to be a specialty of mine.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

There is an excellent community here and an incalculable wealth of assistance and information.

Happy landings!

I confess I've been lurking here awhile, and learning some things on the down-low ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), but now I've decided to creep out into the light.

> 
> I confess I've been lurking here awhile, and learning some things on the down-low ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), but now I've decided to creep out into the light.

Stay away from that stuff, it burns! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the forum!
